products.title: Marble Fresco - Roller Blind
products.description: Flint is a colour that's very much in right now, so why not go in search of an original way to introduce it? Marble fresco is their unique take on the problem, and it combines an earthy colour with a subtly shimmering pattern that shines through into the foreground. The interesting thing about fresco is that it enables you to add a calming influence to your room, but still leaves you with plenty of scope to introduce lighter colours.
